br.uff.midiacom.ana.connector
Interface NCLAction<T,P extends NCLConnectorParam>

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<T>, Element
All Known Implementing Classes:
NCLCompoundAction, NCLSimpleAction
public interface NCLAction<T,P extends NCLConnectorParam>
extends java.lang.Comparable<T>, Element

Esta classe define uma ação de um conector da Nested Context Language (NCL).

See Also:
ABNT NBR 15606-2:2007
